item.title: Mentally Incompetent Biden Confirms Guilt Of J6 Committee, Fauci, Milley With Last-Minute Pardons
item.description: None of the people on this list have been charged for the awful ways they harmed people in their official capacities.

item.title: Miguel Cardona’s Tenure As Education Secretary Was A Masterclass In Failure
item.description: At every turn, Cardona sold American students down the river while advancing sexual and racial activism.

item.title: Trump Orders Federal Government To Recognize Men And Women Are Different
item.description: 'If federal policies promote such an obvious falsehood that men can become women, the government will forfeit all credibility.'

item.title: By Decriminalizing Paid Surrogacy, Michigan Is The Final State To Commercialize Babies
item.description: Feeling a natural attachment towards the child you’re carrying does nothing to benefit the 14-billion-dollar baby-commodifying industry.

item.title: Improving High School AP Courses Starts With Destroying The College Board
item.description: The College Board’s monopoly on watered-down, leftist drivel needs to be broken up before reform can happen.
